comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The initials E. B. on the negative were not included in image title. www.tdn-net.com/genealogy/obits/Judge Theodore Sullivan.htm indicates that there was a Judge E. B. Dillon (but not Dillion) of Columbus in the right sort of time period.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks! We'll fix the title in the source data and reload the description.
